No. 268382)} Sub: Relief to User Fee Collcction Agencies in Case of Suspension of Fee Collection due to Farmers' Agitation in the State of Punjab and Haryana- reg: With the approval of Competent Authority, it has been decided for extension of Circular dated 13.05.2021 (Annexure- 1) regarding Relief to User Fee Collection Agencies a5 a case for cases of Suspension of Fee Collection due to Farmers' Agitation or similar cases where Fee Plazas have become non-functional, resulting in Nil or Zero User Fee Collection in the State of Punjab and Haryana. 2 This Circular will be applicable for the cases occurring between 13.05.2021 and date of issuance of this Circular and will not be applicable to cases which have already been settled by Agency/NHAI; 3 RO-Chandigarh shall decide On, case to case basis, based on Manpower deployed and the Claims of the Agency in this regard. 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl:: As stated above 62Toil - (CS, Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
